T02D2570:30b-0: @30b * // mnyam par bzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag bzhugs//
T02D2570:30b-2: * // 'phags pa 'am dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2570:30b-3: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor bas /
T02D2570:30b-4: nam gyi cha smad rang gi rgyud la brtag pa
T02D2570:30b-5: ni rang nyid lha'i phyag rgya chen por gsal bar
T02D2570:30b-6: byas la // snang ba thams cad dkyil 'khor la bsdus te /
T02D2570:30b-7: dkyil 'khor yang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams gtso bo la bsdus te /
T02D2570:30b-8: gtso bo yang dang po'i sangs rgyas la bsdu /
T02D2570:30b-9: de yang shes rab 'khor lo la bsdu /
T02D2570:30b-10: de yang zla ba la de yang aa la bsdu /
T02D2570:30b-11: aa yang nam mkha'i khams su 'phel te /
T02D2570:30b-12: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u /
T02D2570:30b-13: ae aee ao aoo ai aa: h'um aom hr'i: aa: de rnams su gyur te /
T02D2570:30b-14: skar ma lta bur gsal ba dang /
T02D2570:30b-15: de rnams kyang gcig la gcig thim ste /
T02D2570:30b-16: stong pa chen po yi ge ldar gnas pa dang /
T02D2570:30b-17: de'i dang las stong pa chen po yi ge brgyar langs pa dang /
T02D2570:30b-18: de'i dang las yi ge'i phreng ba bcu drug tu gyur te gnas /
T02D2570:30b-19: de'i dang las brgyad du gnas /
T02D2570:30b-20: de'i dang las yi ge bzhir gyur te gnas pa las /
T02D2570:30b-21: bdag gi lus sgyu ma lta bur langs te 'khor lo bzhi dran par byas la /
T02D2570:30b-22: spyi bor aom dkar po kha thur du 'phyang ba
T02D2570:30b-23: dang mgrin par hr'i: dmar po kha gyen du gdengs
T02D2570:30b-24: pa dang / snying gar h'um sngon po mgo thur du 'dzag pa dang /
T02D2570:30b-25: lte bar aa dkar po thig le dmar po 'od zer gyen du 'phro ba la bltas la /
T02D2570:30b-26: aa dkar po de las 'od zer rno la myur ba /
T02D2570:30b-28: phra zhing ring ba cig langs pas khrag gi thig le la 'od zer phog pa dang /
T02D2570:30b-29: thig le las 'od zer phra la ring ba /
T02D2570:30b-32: drang la gsal ba cig spyi bo'i aom gyi thig le dkar po la reg par gsal ba dang /
T02D2570:30b-33: aom de las yi ge brgya ba'i tshul du byang
T02D2570:30b-34: chub kyi sems bde ba'i rang bzhin thig le dkar
T02D2570:30b-35: po'i tshul du khu 'phang lta bu dkar tsa ra
T02D2570:30b-36: ra 'bab par bsams la rang gi khrag gi thig
T02D2570:30b-37: le la phog pa dang lus thams cad bde bas
T02D2570:30b-38: rgyas te shin tu bde bas gang bar gyur ba
T02D2570:30b-39: dang / de la sems gtad pa ni bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D2570:30b-40: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
T02D2570:30b-42: de yang stong pa nyid du shes par byas nas bde stong dbyer med du bsgom mo //
T02D2570:30b-43: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02D2570:31a-3: de lta bu'i dang las stong pa 'od gsal chos
T02D2570:31a-4: kyi skur thim pa ni mnyam gzhag gi tshe rnam
T02D2570:31a-5: rtog gi dba' rlabs kyis kyang bskyod pa med par
T02D2570:31a-6: nam mkha' la sprin dengs pa 'am /
T02D2570:31a-7: mar me la rlung gis ma bskyod pa 'am rgya
T02D2570:31a-8: mtsho dang ba la rlung gis ma bskyod pa bzhin
T02D2570:31a-9: du zhe 'dod thams cad dang bral ba /
T02D2570:31a-11: 'od gsal chos kyi sku la tsen ne yer re
T02D2570:31a-12: wa re khyug ge ldem me mer re ha re
T02D2570:31a-13: phyal le / yid la mi byed thom me /
T02D2570:31a-14: yor re sim me ting nge mugs se thibs se /
T02D2570:31a-15: yid la mi byed spros bral mi rtog pa gang
T02D2570:31a-16: yin pa de 'di'o snyam pa med pa lta bu
T02D2570:31a-17: mi 'gyur ba so ma rang thag lhug pa lta
T02D2570:31a-18: bu yin la / sems gsal la rtog pa med pa 'di'o snyam pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2570:31a-19: gnyis 'dzin dang gnyis 'dzin ma yin pa'i shes pa gang dang yang bral ba'o //
T02D2570:31a-20: nyon mongs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go //
T02D2570:31a-21: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D2570:31a-22: na ting nge 'dzin brgya la snyoms par zhugs par
T02D2570:31a-23: gyur te / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon dum du 'gyur ro //
T02D2570:31a-24: rjes thob kyi shes pa la ni stong pa chen po yi ge lngar gyur pa dang /
T02D2570:31a-25: de'i ngang las stong pa chen po yi ge brgyar langs pa dang /
T02D2570:31a-26: de'i ngang las yi ge'i phreng ba bcu drug tu 'gyur te /
T02D2570:31a-27: gnas pa las ni bar snang gi khams su a'a li k'a li'i phreng bar bltas la /
T02D2570:31a-28: de la sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sprul par bya'o //
T02D2570:31a-29: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i /
T02D2570:31a-30: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2570:31a-31: pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag rdzogs
T02D2570:31a-33: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
